item.title: Getting started with UML (Unified Modeling Language)
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction This post document will brief introduct UML at the begining. After, will talk how using PlantUML for drawing UML diagrams. At the end, how does PlantUML integrate with Markdown and Emacs(Spacemacs). UML Basics PlantUML Basics Reasons for using PlantUML Markdown Emacs (Spacemacs) Summary
